Text.Value: They are... brother and sister. Cal says... I am family, but...
My... training... must get to... Lorroakan.
What is so important about Lorroakan?
Everything. He'll make me... greatest wizard... in Faerûn.
With Lia... and Cal. They are brother and sister. But I am... not blood.
To Baldur's Gate... to Lorroakan... my destiny.
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
No family? What about Lia and Cal?
Too fast but... can't be. Must finish...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: Rolan has been killed. Even in corpse form, his desire to become the greatest wizard in all of Faerun is clear.
